io.github.dddplus.model

接口 IBehavioralRule

  • 所有超级接口:
    IRule

    public interface IBehavioralRule
extends IRule
    Behavioral Rule, aim to directly shape people's behavior.

    They set boundaries for acceptable behavior.

      Key features:
    • can be violated: 警察局，审判机构，监狱，都是为它可能被破坏而准备的
    • confer rights in groups and communities of people

    行为的：指导，约束条件，执行规范

      行为性规则，通常表现为如下形式：
    • must or must not be
    • should or should not be
    • how to be

    Behavioral rules without IDefinitionalRule are often vague. Lack of precision means enforcement will be inconsistent or capricious.

    行为性规则，有可以类比的两种类型：hard limit vs soft limit.

      行为性规则的实际例子：
    • An order over $1,000 must not be accepted on credit without a credit check
    • An order's date promised must be at least 24 hours after the order's date taken
